titleStmt.title: A message sent forth from the risen seed of God being a faithful expostulation and testimony concerning the unjust and hard dealings of the rulers and people in England who have a hand in the cruel oppressions and sufferings of the people of God called Quakers.
titleStmt.author: Bayly, William, d. 1675.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
